entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections late this evening and overnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain at times heavy. High 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. Rain at times heavy beginning late in the morning. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 60 gusting to 90 near noon then diminishing to 40 gusting to 60. High 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 02 February 2023
